entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
